extendedIngredients.name: international delight
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1/4 cup International Delight (add flavor type here)

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Milkshake

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are my top picks for Milkshake. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. The NV Solera Cream Sherry with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: Add ice cream, 2 cookies and International Delight to a blender and blend until combined. Will be thick. Garnish with additional cookie if desired.

steps.step: Add ice cream, 2 cookies and International Delight to a blender and blend until combined. Will be thick.
Garnish with additional cookie if desired.
